channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Meta-backed Hupo finds growth after pivot to AI sales coaching from mental wellness
item.description: Hupo, backed by Meta, pivoted from mental wellness to AI sales coaching for banks and insurers, and secured a $10M Series A led by DST Global

item.title: Aussies are flocking to high-speed NBN plans – here’s how to join them and the plans to get
item.description: It's been 4 months since NBN Co launched a series of upgraded speed tiers and, judging by the number of new sign ups, they're proving a bit hit with Australian customers.

item.title: Trump Claims He and Microsoft Have a Solution for AI-Related Utility Price Spikes
item.description: Is Microsoft… going to subsidize our utility bills?
